name: places/ChIJBfmQyif2wokRWm-eEv5NT60
formattedAddress: 766 Amsterdam Ave # 2, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 766 Amsterdam Ave # 2, New York, NY 10025-5703, USA

originalText.text: PLEASE make sure you are referring to Brusco Realty Management, Inc. at 766 Amsterdam Ave before leaving a review.  There are 2 companies in NYC with similar names and vastly different service.  The one I reference has no "Joe Brusco", is family owned and operated and simply could not be more wonderful.  I have lived in my apartment for 15 years, will be leaving soon because I can FINALLY afford to buy, and I'm kind of devastated.  Every concern I had, every even minor work I needed (down to changing light bulbs in a high ceiling fixture - they would even help soap-and-water clean the attached ceiling fan with pleasure!) has consistently been addressed professionally, quickly and with care and kindness by everyone involved.  My extremely charming, pre-war, true 1 bedroom - with French doors, plenty of closet space and a fireplace will soon open up on the UWS.  My advice is RUN TO BRUSCO and snag it.

originalText.text: Brusco Equities has been my landlord for the past 2 years and they really are the best! The entire staff and the super at the building are all so kind, reliable, and responsive. I can’t tell you the amount of times I’ve lost my keys and someone at Brusco has come to my rescue in minutes. I have never experienced any problems with pests or leaks or anything like that - the building is well maintained.  I have lived in the city for 6 years and this is hands down the best landlord I’ve ever had

originalText.text:
I am pretty confident that the negative reviews are regarding the other Brusco. This is a the best landlord I have had living in NYC. I have not had any significant issues since moving in 2 years ago. They maintain the buildings well and we have good heat and hot water through the winter. Super is great and property is lovely.

-MS

originalText.text:
I contacted Joe Brusco regarding the square feet of 1 apartment. He didn’t email back so I called him. He was very rude and claimed he didn’t know
and then hung up on me.
I couldn’t believe that what happened so I called back. Again he was extremely rude and hung up on me. He made me feel so dumb and stressed.
Don’t call there.  Waste of time and energy.

originalText.text: This has to be a mistake with the bad reviews. Brusco has become like family, I have an issue and the next day they are in to fix it. Please don't confuse the best Management Company in the city with another one...I will recommend them 100%. I've received nothing but the best treatment even when fallen into hardship made me late for rent they never insisted or made me feel bad.
